original_text: Mephibosheth had a young son named Mika, and all the members of Ziba’s household were servants of Mephibosheth.
korean_text: 므비보셋에게 어린 아들 하나가 있으니 이름은 미가더라 시바의 집에 사는 자마다 므비보셋의 종이 되니라

sentences.original_text: Mephibosheth had a young son named Mika
and all the members of Ziba's household
